mapper.insert: insert into sailtotmdb.PayHistory (created_date, pay_amount, pay_type, stuff_id, pay_sum_id, pay_out_or_in) values (#{createdDate}, #{payAmount}, #{payType}, #{stuffId}, #{paySumId}, #{payOutOrIn})
insert into sailtotmdb.PaySum (pay_now, pay_expect, created_date, updated_date) values (#{payNow}, #{payExpect}, #{createdDate}, #{updatedDate})
